text: Marek Stanisław Minda (14 February 1950 - 13 August 2021) was a Polish physician and politician. He was born in Starachowice, Poland. In 1993, he was elected to the Senate of Poland as a member of the Labour Union. Minda left office in 1997. Minda died on 13 August 2021 in Łomża, Poland at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish politicians Category:Polish physicians
title: Marek Minda
